page.title: 03A day in the life of Damian
page.content: My name is Damian Perkin, I am 10 years old and I live at Bugbrooke in Northants. When I get up in the morning I get dressed, have my breakfast and go to school. We have registration then go into the hall for Assembly at 9.15. We come out at 9.50 and we do some maths then we have playtime at 10.40. After play we read or do English until 12.00 then I have my dinner. At 1.15 we come in and do Topic, Art or P.E. until 3.30. Then I go home and have a drink. I go out to play until 5.00 when I have my tea. After tea I watch TV for about an hour. I take my dog for a walk at 6.30, then I have my supper and I go to bed about 9.30.
